      • tempConformation

        private static Conformation tempConformation
        A temporary object will serve several methods. It is intended to save the object creation time for frequently used methods. it is expected that every method clears this object before it is used.

    • Method Detail

      • getRandomConformation

        private Conformation getRandomConformation(Dimensions dimensions,
                                 java.util.Random random,
                                 int maxTries)
        Grows a random protein conformation one monomer. after the other The conformation needs to be self-avoiding and thus a random building process may end-up in a dead end. In that case the building process is repeated.
        Parameters:
        maxTries - maximal numbers of tries before we give up.

      • getRandomConformation

        private boolean getRandomConformation(Dimensions dimensions,
                            java.util.Random random,
                            Conformation conformation)
        An attempts to grow a random protein conformation one monomer. after the other.
        Returns:
        true if succeeded, false if reached a dead-end.

      • setConformation

        public int setConformation(Conformation conformation)
        Assign a conformation to the protein. The directions of the monomers are set iteratively and each monomer checkes that the direction assined to it is valid. The correctness of this method depends on the assumption that the grid is empty (all its cells are null) at the beginning of the execution.
        Parameters:
        conformation -
        Returns:
        true if scuceeded.

      • crossover

        public static void crossover(Protein in1,
             Protein in2,
             Protein out1,
             Protein out2,
             java.util.Random random)
        Crossover event between two proteins.(in1 & in2) into two other proteins (out1 & out2). If the crossover fails the out proteins are reset.
        Parameters:
        in1 -
        in2 -
        out1 -
        out2 -
